document.heading: Advisory Commission on Sentencing Structured Sentencing System Pilot Program Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-190, the “Advisory Commission on Sentencing Structured Sentencing System Pilot Program Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-711, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 4, 2004, and June 1, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 23, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-457 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-190 became effective on September 30, 2004.
